name: Timestamp-to-Date for Crowd
description: With this plugin installed, input fields containing a timestamp (e.g. user attributes) will display a human-readable date in a tooltip when hovering over that input field.

name: Two-Factor Authentication (2FA) for Crowd
description: Data Center Security: 2FA Login for Crowd - on-premise or cloud. Simplicity and security combined for the best user experience. Use TOTP or FIDO for authentication, or the app for touch authentication with Android, iOS, OSX, Windows 10

name: CAC/PIV © Authenticator for Jira
description: The CAC/PIV Authenticator for Jira offers secure SSO with CAC and PIV cards, meeting NIST SP 800-53 (REV 4) and STIG standards. It ensures easy integration via Atlassian's UPM, enhancing security and user experience by eliminating password use.

name: Atlassian Universal Plugin Manager

Use the UPM to manage installed apps, search for and install new
apps, upgrade an application or app, enter license information and
more.
